import React from 'react' import { Card, Col, Container, Row, Stack } from 'react-bootstrap' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import splash1 from '../images/splash-1.svg' import splash2 from '../images/splash-2.svg' import splash3 from '../images/splash-3.svg' import githublogo from '../images/github-logo.png' const SplashPage = (props) => { return (
{/* find good landing page image */} React App Photo by Alexander Shatov on Unsplash Responsive Design Welcome to my React Social Media App. This is a mock website soley made to test my own skills. You can make an account but it will not be saved after you leave. Next step is to learn MongoDB and Docker to help maintain a real database. Bootstap Components Reusable Components Built with React,React-Bootstrap,React-Router-Dom,Formik Learning Fundamentals Front End Frameworks Testing new technologies. Check out my Github! Greatly Appreciated Github Repo!
) } export default SplashPage
